name: Service Employees International Union
goal: The Service Employees International Union is an organization of 2-million members united by the belief in the dignity and worth of workers and the services they provide and dedicated to improving the lives of workers and their families and creating a more just and humane society.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Employment issues
Trade negotiations
EU Gender Equality
Company policy
Tax issues
Social Dialogue
